query:
WITH base_search AS (
                        SELECT
                            u.id,
                            u.username,
                            u.email,
                            u.role_id,
                            u.is_active,
                            r.role_name,
                            similarity(u.username || ' ' || u.email, $3) AS sim_score
                        FROM users u
                        JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.id
                        WHERE
                            (u.username ILIKE '%' || $3 || '%')
                            OR
                            (u.email ILIKE '%' || $3 || '%')
                            OR
                            (
                                (u.username || ' ' || u.email) % $3
                                AND
                                similarity(u.username || ' ' || u.email, $3) >= $4
                            )
                    ),
                    ranked_results AS (
                        SELECT
                            *,
                            CASE
                                WHEN username ILIKE $3 OR email ILIKE $3 THEN 10
                                WHEN username ILIKE '%' || $3 || '%' OR email ILIKE '%' || $3 || '%' THEN 8
                                ELSE 6
                            END as search_rank
                        FROM base_search
                     ),
                    total_count AS (
                        SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM ranked_results
                    )
                    SELECT
                        rr.id,
                        rr.username,
                        rr.email,
                        rr.role_name,
                        rr.role_id,
                        rr.is_active,
                        tc.total as total_items
                    FROM ranked_results rr
                    CROSS JOIN total_count tc
                    -- We can order by columns (search_rank, sim_score) that are not in the final SELECT list
                    ORDER BY rr.search_rank DESC, rr.sim_score DESC, rr.id ASC
                    LIMIT $1
                    OFFSET $2
